survey_name: AI in Creative Industries Adoption Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the adoption rates, benefits, and challenges of AI tools in creative industries such as design, music, and content creation.

questions.question_text: Which creative industry do you primarily work in?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for mobile-friendliness. Include an 'Other' option with text input for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which creative industry do you primarily work in?

questions.question_text: Have you used AI-powered tools in your creative work?
answer_options: No, and I don’t plan to
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you used AI-powered tools in your creative work?
answer_options: No, and I don’t plan to

questions.question_text: What types of AI tools do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse tool usage.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of AI tools do you use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using AI tools?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an open-ended option for nuanced feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2

questions.question_text: How has AI impacted your creative process?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2
questions.client_notes: This question assesses perceived value. Use a Likert scale for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How has AI impacted your creative process?
script.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'Yes, regularly' or 'Yes, occasionally' to Q2

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to adopt AI tools in your work?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'No, but I plan to' or 'No, and I don’t plan to' to Q2
questions.client_notes: Capture barriers to adoption. Allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to adopt AI tools in your work?
script.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'No, but I plan to' or 'No, and I don’t plan to' to Q2

questions.question_text: What concerns do you have about using AI in creative work?
questions.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'No, and I don’t plan to' to Q2
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture nuanced reservations (e.g., job displacement, originality).

script.question_text: What concerns do you have about using AI in creative work?
script.routing_logic: Displayed only to respondents who answered 'No, and I don’t plan to' to Q2

questions.question_text: How do you envision AI shaping the future of your industry?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture broad perspectives. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit enforcement.
